name: Generous Clubs
description: Today, all traders with the club suit are more generous.

name: Jack's Day
description: Traders with rank JACK raise their prices.

name: Hearts on Sale
description: After a bloody turf war, heart traders lower their prices to move stock fast.

name: Spades' Tribute
description: Spade traders raise prices to fund protection money for their don.

name: Aces High
description: Aces are in demand after last night's high-stakes game.

name: Queen's Favor
description: Queen-rank traders offer deals to earn favor with the syndicate.

name: Rumors in the Air
description: Rumors swirl, but no one makes a move... yet.

name: Diamond Crackdown
description: With diamond dons under investigation, traders hike prices out of fear.

name: Old Debts
description: Some say a legendary card shark is back in town.

name: Spades Capo Dead
description:
A Spades capo, known for his loyality to your enemy Ricky Two-Folds,
		mysteriously dies at hospital.
		The Spades are shaken and have to lower their prices.

name: The Fire Rituals
description:
At night, everyone sees bright red flames twirl in the air.
		At sunrise, they just dissappear.

name: Diamond Don Burned
description:
A mysterious fire creatures attacks a Diamond Don as he was going out to get a drink.
		He manages to escape alive after pouring his 'Zloy' juice at the creature, but he is left with burn scars.
		Diamonds raise their prices, as they need money to investigate the accident.

name: Clubs in Ruins
description:
An Ace of Clubs sells his cards and donates his money to charity, before leaving the city forever.
		A power struggle between remaining Clubs severely weakens their positions and forces them to lower prices.

name: Diamond Discount
description:
A restaurant belonging to a Diamond Don now prospers, as Ricky's men have stopped raiding it.
		As a reward, Diamond traders are required to give you a discount today.

name: Spades Raided
description:
The police storm Ricky's hideout, killing or capturing his men. 
		You hear the story from your old acquaintance, who barely managed to escape.
		The Spades clan is shaken.
